name: Friendship Ended With Mudasir Meme Template
description: Friendship Ended With Mudasir refers to a Facebook post by Asif Raza Rana, announcing he was no longer friends with a man named Mudasir. After the post widely circulated online in September 2015, it spawned a series of parodies featuring various celebrities and fictional characters captioned with the phrasal template "Friendship ended with X / Now Y is my best friend."
